title: Satou-kun wa Miteiru.: Kamisama Appli de Onnanoko no Kokoro wo Nozoitara Do xx Datta
original_name: 佐藤くんは覗〈み〉ている。～神様アプリで女の子のココロをノゾいたらど ×× だった～
sinopse:
Kazuya Satou is a 30-year-old office worker and a virgin. His daily routine is playing eroge while masturbating. One night, he got the "Peeping App" from God. It was not an ordinary app, but an app that could read a woman's heart.

(Source: MU)
